attributes.action: Recognise Injustice of Ethnic Cleansing of Millions of Germans from East Prussia, Silesia and Pomerania and to disregard the Infamous Allied Decree of 1947 which supposedly abolished the State of Prussia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Churchill and Attlee Governments
 colluded in one of the worst Cases of
 Ethnic Cleansing and Persecution in the
 period of the 20th Century and World
 History with regards to the Germans of
 East Prussia, Silesia and Pomerania.

 We Call upon the British Government to
 formally Acknowledge the Injustice of
 that and not only Apologuise for this
 but to recognise the Right of Germany
 to have a State at the Heart of it 
 called Prussia and for a German 
 Government to Insist upon the Return 
 of Germany's Stolen Territories
